data.basic2: To rotate, press the respective button in the left/right corner. To close the door, click on it. To select a camera, zoom in and click on the respective button. To zoom in to the monitor, click on it. To zoom out press the button that appeared.
data.floppa2: Floppa will go to a random room every move chance. Active every night. To prevent him killing you, monitor cameras 1 and 9, and if you hear door opening, close the respective door.
data.popcat2: Pop Cat will appear on the camera you switched to with a random chance. You should immediatly switch to a different one, or else he will kill you. On some nights he will also kill you if you'll look at his camera if he hasn't left it yet. Inactive on nights 1 and 3.
data.bingus2: Bingus will go in this order of cameras: 3>5>2>1. If he is on the camera 1 and you won't make him go back, he will kill you immediatly. To make him stay in current camera or go back, look at him for some time. Inactive on nights 1 and 2.
data.killp:
Kill if you look 
at his camera again
